name: Wizzball (GameJam Project)
description:
Wizzball is a local multiplayer dodgeball game in which you craft potions to then destroy the enemy by throwing them onto their field and hitting them with a fireball (dodgeball) at the same time.

This was a gamejam project (gamejam organized by howest kortrijk).

Game Made by:

  • Janssens Bernard
  • Soetewey Ischa
  • Vindevogel Taho
  • Van Bever Ward
  • Fierens Tristan
